name: High Fives!
description:
Winner of the "Best Game Feel" jury award at the Nordic Game Jam 2015 !!HIGH FIVES
A Rock–Paper–Scissors Sci-Fi Showdown.Battle with your friends in this epic sci-fi multiplayer slap-fest built on the obviously simple game: Rock-Paper-Scissors. Each player controls an incredibly long arm and fights through the art of throwing hand gestures.

Includes:

–Two Player simultanously slapping!
– All your favourite hand signs! Throw epic gestures such as: "High Five", "Bro Fist" and the all time fan "F*ck you!"
– Dynamic 3D soundtrack that adapts to the environment!
– Open world endless space to explore!

Controls (Blue Player):

  • Forward: W
  • Reverse: S
  • Turn left: A
  • Turn right: D
  • Gestures: 1, 2, 3
  • Spin: Z

Controls (Red Player):

  • Forward: I
  • Reverse: K
  • Turn left: J
  • Turn right: L
  • Gestures: 7, 8, 9
  • Spin: N

Press ESC to restart game.

Self.Execute is
Robert Nagy
Frederik Williams
